Translations.Text: kopha! Khuba ja prabhutvasali a kura'anana songada che
parantu te'one asrcarya thayum ke te'o pase temana manthi ja eka saceta karanara avyo. To inkari'o e kahyu ke a eka vicitra vastu che
sum jyare ame mrtyu pamya pachi mati tha'i ja'isum? Pachi a pacha pharavanum (samajani bahara) che
dharati je kami pana temanthi ghatade che tene ame jani'e chi'e, ane amari pase dareka vastu yadarakhanaru pustaka che
parantu te'o'e sacivatane jutha theravi che, jyare ke te temani pase pahonci ga'i, basa! Te'o eka munjhavanamam padi gaya che
sum te'o'e akasane potani upara nathi joyum? Ke ame tene kevi rite banavyum che, ane sanagaryum che, temam ko'i phata nathi
ane dharatine ame pathari didhi che ane temam ame pahado nakhi didha che, ane temam ame alaga alaga prakarani sundara vanaspati'o ugadi che
jethi dareka pacha pharanara mate jova ane samajava matenum karana bane
ane ame akasa manthi barakatavalum pani varasavyum ane tenathi bagica'o ane kapavavali khetinum anaja peda karyu
ane khajurona unca unca vrkso jemana guccha eka para eka che
Banda'oni roji mate ane ame pani vade mrta saherane jivita kari didhu, avi ja rite (kabaro manthi) nikalavanum che
a pahela nuhani kome ane rasavala'o'e (eka komanum nama) ane samudiyo'e
ada ane phira'aune, ane lutana loko'e
ane ayakahavala'o'e ane tubba'a ni komavala'e pana juthalavyu hatum, sau'e payagambarone juthalavya, basa! Mari yatananum vacana te'o para sacu tha'i gayum
sum ame prathama vakhata peda kari thaki gaya? Parantu a loko nava sarjana vise sankamam che
ame manavinum sarjana karyu che ane te'ona hrdayomam je vicaro utpanna thaya che tene ame jani'e chi'e ane ame teni dhori nasathi pana vadhu najika che
je samaye be lenara la'i le che, eka jamani baju ane eka dabi baju bethela che
(manavi) mom vade ko'i sabda boli sakato nathi parantu teni upara be dekharekha rakhanara taiyara che
ane mrtani behosi satya la'ine avi pahonci, a ja jenathi tum katarato hato
ane suramam phunka maravamam avase, yatanana vacanano divasa a ja che
ane dareka vyakti evi rite avase ke teni sathe eka hankanara ane eka saksi apanara
ni:Sanka tame tenathi bedarakara hata, parantu ame tamari samethi paradohatavi lidho, basa! Aje tari najhara khuba ja tejha che
teni sathe je pharisto che te kahese a hajara che je mari pase hatum
dhakeli do jahannamamam dareka inkari prathabhrasta ne
je sadakaryothi rokanara, hada vatavi janara ane sanka karanara hata
jene allaha sathe bijane pujya banavi rakhya hata, basa! Tene sakhata yatanamam dhakeli do
teni satheno (saitana) kahese he amara palanahara mem tene pathabhrasta nahato karyo, parantu a pote ja khulla geramarge hato
(Allaha) kahese basa! Mari same jhaghadavani vata na karo, hum to pahelathi ja tamari tarapha cetavani (yatananum vacana) mokali cukayo hato
mari pase vata badalati nathi ane na to hum mara banda'o para thodoka pana atyacara karavavalo chum
pachi hame jahannama thi puchisum sum tum bhara'i ga'i? Te javaba apase, sum haju vadhare che
ane jannata sanyamarakhanara mate najika karavamam avase, thodika pana dura nahi hoya
a te che jenum vacana tamane apavamam avatu hatum, dareka te vyakti mate je pacho pharanara ane niyantrana rakhanara hase
je rahamanathi vanadekhe darato hoya ane tauba karanaru hrdaya lavyo hase
tame a jannatamam salamati sathe pravesa pamo, a hammesa mate no divasa che
a (loko) tyam icchase, te'onum ja che, (parantu) amari pase ghanum badhum che
ane a pahela pana ame ghana samudayone nasta kari cukaya che, je a lokothi him'matamam ghani vadhare hati
amam hrdayavala mate sikhamana che, ane tena mate je dhyanadharine sambhale ane te hajara hoya
ni:Sanka ame akasa ane dharati ane je kami te'oni vacce che saunum cha divasamam sarjana kari didhum ane ame thakaya pana nahi
basa! A je kami pana kahe che tame tena para dhiraja rakho ane potana palanaharana namanum smarana prasansa sathe karo, suryodaya ane suryasta pahela pana
ane ratana ko'i pana samaye smarana karo ane namajha pachi pana
ane sambhalo ke je divasa eka pokaravavalo najikani jagya'ethi pokarase
je divase te sakhata cisane nisrcitapane sambhali lese, a divasa nikalavano hase
ame ja jivita kari'e chi'e ane ame ja mrtyu pana api'e chi'e. Ane amari ja pase pacha pharine avavanum che
Je divase dharati phati padase ane a dodata (nikali padase), a bhega kari devum amara mate khuba ja sarala che
a loko je kami kahi rahya che ame khuba ja sari rite jani'e chi'e ane tame te'ona para samartha nathi, to tame kura'ana vade te'one samajavata raho, je mari yatana (cetavaninum vacana) thi dare che
